title: Prepper's Natural Medicine: Life-Saving Herbs, Essential Oils
description:
Prepper's Natural Medicine: Life-Saving Herbs, Essential Oils and Natural Remedies for When There is No Doctor by Cat Ellis

English | 2015 | ISBN: 161243438X | 184 pages | EPUB | 8 MB

When disaster strikes and you lose all access to doctors, hospitals and pharmacies, natural medicine will be your family's best hope for survival.
